name: Account
title: How do I create an account?
content: To create an account, click on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage and fill out the required information.

name: Login
title: I forgot my password. What should I do?
content: If you forgot your password, go to the login page and click on 'Forgot Password.' Follow the instructions to reset your password.

name: Ordering
title: How do I place an order?
content: To place an order, browse through the products, add items to your cart, and proceed to checkout. Follow the steps to complete your order.

name: Delivery
title: What are the delivery options?
content: We offer standard delivery and express delivery. Standard delivery usually takes 2-3 days, while express delivery arrives within 24 hours.

name: Refunds
title: How can I request a refund?
content: If you want to request a refund, please contact our customer support team with your order details. We will assist you with the refund process.

name: Payments
title: What payment methods do you accept?
content: We accept credit cards, debit cards, and online payment platforms such as PayPal and Stripe.
